word_mean: 外分泌物：尤指通常的小汗腺，同exocrine

sentence.Network_en: Syringomas are common appendageal tumors of intraepidermal eccrine ducts.
sentence.Network_cn: 摘要汗管瘤为常见之皮肤附属器官肿瘤,好犯于下眼皮及双颊.

sentence.Network_en: Some authors adnexal origin because of dermallocationof the tumor with focal eccrine, sebaceous, or follicular differentiation.
sentence.Network_cn: 因为肿瘤位于真皮中,而且有部皆汗腺 、 皮脂腺或及毛囊的分化,所以有些作者认为肿瘤的来源为皮肤附属器.

sentence.Network_en: Vellus hair follicles, sebaceous glands and eccrine glands inthe overlying dermis were also noted.
sentence.Network_cn: 上方真皮层中含有毫毛囊 、 皮脂腺及汗腺.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 医学制药词汇英语翻译(E-L) ... eccoprotic 轻泻药 eccrine 外分必的 eccrisis 排泄.
英汉常用生物学词汇... ... eccentric ① 偏心的，离心的②偏心轮 eccrine ① 外分泌的②外分泌物 eccritic ① 促排泄的②排泄剂.
其中最多的是小汗腺（eccrine），遍布身体各处，包括脚底、手心、额头、脸颊、腋下。D:真皮E:表皮F:小汗腺G:大汗腺H:毛囊S:皮脂腺
英汉常用生物学词汇... ... eccentric ① 偏心的，离心的②偏心轮 eccrine ① 外分泌的②外分泌物 eccritic ① 促排泄的②排泄剂.

list.abs: 汗腺(sweat gland) 可分为两种;一是外分泌腺(eccrine gland),另一种则是泌离分泌腺(apocrine gland)外分泌腺→产生单纯之液体分泌,没有细胞浆或细胞内容物之.
Eccrinales 外毛菌目eccrine gland 分泌腺; 小汗腺-
...目录1231基本概述小汗腺汗囊肿（eccrine hidrocystomas）可能为小汗腺导管畸形引起暂时或永久性汁液潴留；酶组织化学显示有小汗腺酶、磷酸化酶和琥珀酸脱氢酶存在。.

derivation.yuyuan_name: 1930s: from Greek ekkrinein 'secrete', from ek- 'out' + krinein 'sift, separate'

means.word_mean: 1. (of exocrine glands) producing a clear aqueous secretion without releasing part of the secreting cell; important in regulating body temperature

auth_sentence.content: Eccrine glands occur over most of your body and open directly onto the surface of the skin.
